defs: the quality of burning brightly or being bright; brightness.
the quality or fact of being splendid; splendidness.
the quality or state of having exceptional merit; virtuousness.
the sentiment of love or sexual passion; the erotic sentiment.
excessive pride in oneself or one's appearance, wealth, knowledge, etc.; a display of these.
a tropical plant, Ricinus communis of Euphorbiaceae family and its oil-rich seeds; castor oil plant.
the oil extracted from seeds of castor plant (Ricinus communis).
(mus.) consisting of five notes only in both ascending and descending order.
(mus.) any mode which consists of five notes only in both ascending and descending order.
a hymn of Sāma Vēda that uses only five notes while being recited.
(mus.) a mode which consists of five notes in ascending and six notes in descending order.
(mus.) a mode which consists of five notes in ascending and all the seven notes (of the main mode which it is derived from) in descending order.
to bite with the teeth, esp. to grind with the molar teeth.
to chew the cud, as a cow does; to ruminate.
that portion of the jaw that holds the back or grinding teeth.
the lower lip.
a grain of anything.
that which cannot be ground with the teeth.
the act of chewing the cud; rumination.
to bite the lips teeth, as from anger.
the act or fact of biting one's lips.

a rich and elaborate meal; a banquet; a festive dinner.

a formal dinner for many people, usually with toasts and speeches; a banquet.
to feed a rich and elaborate meal; to honour with a banquet.

flexible body armor made of small, overlapping metal rings, loops of chain or scales used as a protective cover for the body by soldiers.
a presentation; a gift.
matters of business or concern; the manner in which they are conducted.
the state of being good or relatively better.
the quality of being good or better; superiority.
in, of, to, toward or facing the north; living in or from the northern region, country or countries; characteristic of the northern countries, people etc.; northern.

the common reading of a literary work, the Vēdas, any of the epics, prevailing or was prevailing in North India; a reading having the influence, corrections, amendments, insertions made in North India.

a slightly variable, super giant, binary star, the brightest star in the constellation Ursa Minor, with a magnitude of 2.1, used for navigation, since it is the closest star to the north celestial pole and remains nearly stationary throughout the night; North Star; Pole Star:.
= ಔತ್ತಾನಪಾದ.
the vowel 'ಔ'.
its sound and the sign used to donate it when compounded with a consonant.
the fact of having an ardent feeling or showing keen desire; impatience or anxiousness; eagerness.
a strong desire (esp. to know what, whom, how etc. of something); intense desire; zeal.
a troubled feeling; anxiety; uneasiness.
a man who knows how to cook or who prepares food; a cook.
greedy in eating; devouring or eager to devour large quantities of food; ravenous; gluttonous; voracious.
a man who greedily eats too much.
to keep oneself from others sight; to hide or abscond.
(Jain.) the gross body (of humans) (as opp. to the subtle one).

the quality or state of being magnanimous; generosity; magnanimity; nobility.
the quality, state or fact of being indifferent; esp. lack of concern, interest or feeling; apathy; indifference; unconcern.

of, relating to or made from the fig tree (Ficus racemosa = F. glomerata) or its fruit.

the tree itself or its fruit.

a progressive infectious disease, in its worst stage, caused by the bacterium Mycobacterium leprae that attacks the skin, flesh, nerves, etc.; leprosy.
the behaviour characterised by being boldly respectful in speech or manners; insolence; overbearingness; haughtiness; contumacy.

industrialise - a) to make industrial; establish or develop industrialism in; b) to organise as an industry.

industrial - a) having the nature of or characterised by industries; b) of, connected with or resulting from industries; c) working in industries; d) of or concerned with people working in industries; e) (said of products) for use by industries.
technical - a) having to do with the practical, industrial or mechanical arts or the applied sciences; b) skilled in a particular science, art, etc.

the process of training and developing the knowledge, skill, mind, character, etc., esp. by formal schooling with the practical, industrial or mechanical arts or the applied sciences; technical education.
that which is relating to marriage.
a gift, presentation made to the bride at her marriage.
the tree Lagerstroemia lauceolata of Lythraceae family; white teak.
the quality of being grand; stateliness; grandeur, esp.- a) splendour; magnificence b) moral or intellectual greatness; nobility.
height - a) the distance from the bottom to the top; b) greatest degree; extreme; climax; culmination.
a surveyoṛs level with rigid connection of the telescope to the vertical spindle; the dumpy-level.

formal - a) of or according to prescribed or fixed customs, rules, ceremonies, etc.; ceremonial; b) done or made in orderly, regular fashion; methodical; c) conventional, often without practical meaning.
conferring honour; showing respect; honorific; complimentary.

formality - a) the quality or state of being formal; specif., a) a following or observing of prescribed customs, rules, ceremonies, etc.; protocol; b) a formal or conventional act or requirement; ceremony or form, often without practical meaning.
(pros.) name of a meter consisting of four lines of alternately eleven and twelve syllabic instants.
a pile of wood, on which a dead body is burned in a funeral rite; a pyre.

relating to close or immediate contact.

a repetition of a story already heard from others.

a short story, narration of an incident, in support of the main story; in a novel, poem, discourse, etc., any part of the story or a narrative digression, that is largely complete in itself; an episode.
relating to or depending on special quality, limited by certain conditions or valid under a particular supposition or suppositions.

of, related to, belonging to, bearing in the, breast.

one's own son.

the art or profession of preparing and dispensing drugs and medicines; pharmacy.
to treat with a medicine.
consisting of, made from, related to, herb or any medicinal plant.
of or having the properties of, medicine; curing, healing or relieving; medicinal.
of, related to or coming from a camel.
a group of camels.
being at the lips; of the lips; labial.
articulated with one or both lips.

any of the letters articulated with one or two lips (ಪ, ಫ, ಬ, ಭ); the sound so produced; a labial sound.

(abbr. form of ಕಮ್ಮ) an old unit of measure of land area.

Manmatha, the Love-God.
fire or the Fire-God; Agni.
wind or the Wind-God, Vāyu.
the Death-God, Yama.
the sun; the Sun-God.
the spiritual or immaterial part of a human being or animal, commonly regarded as immortal; the soul.

a man having or showing relatively higher intelligence.
a human being in which both male and female sex organs are present or in which the sex organs contain both ovarian and testicular tissue; a hermaphrodite.
a male peafowl, having brilliant plumage and a tail (with eyelike markings) or its female; a peacock or peahen.
a tropical bird of the order Psittaciformes, with a short hooked bill, often having vivid plumage and sometimes able to mimic the human voice; parrot.

an organ of sense.

water.

any ornament, in gen. usu. furnished with small bell or bells.

human head or a comb or tuft of feathers, fur, etc. on a bird's or animal's head; crest.
a drop or drops of water sprayed; water spray.
a drop of clear salty liquid secreted by glands, that serves to moisten and wash the eye and is shed from it in grief or other strong emotions; tear.
water.
the organ of sight.
the white colour.
great or dazzling brightness; splendour; brilliance.
a male peafowl, having brilliant plumage and a tail (with eyelike markings) or its female; a peacock or a peahen.

armed hostilities between esp. nations; conflict; a war.
